Sizing on the shirt runs about 2x too small (I'm a 5'6" male, weighing 130lbs; and a "Large" fit as if it was a very snug medium).  On that factor alone, I originally opted to return the product; but decided to gift it to my 14yr old son instead, since I really loved the design.  What a big mistake that was was!!  He's worn the shirt ONCE and it's already falling apart!!  After being put through the washer, the lettering is cracked / faded; making it look like it's been purchased from a 2nd hand thrift store . . . and not in the trendy good way. LolWay overpriced for the quality received.  I haven't been this disappointed in a purchase in quite some time.  Hopefully this review helps someone else, so you DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!

It's been forty-four long, hard years, and I've been searching for the perfect t-shirt this whole time. Well, believe me when I say that the struggle is over, because I finally found this gem. The cotton is softer than Ghostface Killah's flow, and the design is fresher than a freshly laid down beat. It's the perfect way to show my love for one of the greatest hip hop groups of all time, and the perfect way to distract from the fact that I still can't spit a hot verse to save my life. If you want to elevate your street style and let everyone know that you're still strugglin' in style, this t-shirt is the answer to your prayers.
The best shirt In the closet!
